name: General Tso's Chicken
ingredients: 1 tablespoon orange zest, you'll need 1 medium orange
1 tablespoon granular Splenda or equivalent liquid Splenda
1 1/2 pounds boneless chicken breasts, cut in 2" strips
2 tablespoons red bell pepper, diced, 3/4 ounce or about 1/4 of a small pepper
1/3 cup green onions, sliced, 3 large green onions or 1 ounce after trimming

instructions.en: Whisk all marinade ingredients in a small bowl.
Pour marinade into a gallon zipper bag with chicken strips. Knead to distribute.
Marinate chicken in refrigerator for 1 hour.
Remove chicken from bag, reserving excess marinade.
Heat oil in wok or large skillet over high heat. Cook and stir chicken 2 minutes until it starts to brown.
Add bell pepper, green onions and marinade. Cook 3-4 minutes, stirring constantly, until sauce reduces and chicken is done.
If using xanthan gum, sprinkle it lightly over the chicken and stir in.

notes: Makes 4 servings. Do not freeze. The original recipe called for 2 tablespoons of orange zest.
